Detailed Description

Represente the configuration of XINX. The configuration of unique for a unique process.

const QString &  defaultValue

QString XINXConfig::getTools ( const QString &  tool,
bool  showDialog = true,
QWidget *  parentWindow = 0 
)

Get the tool name from the configuration, and if the tool doesn't exist or is not defined a dialog box to ask the user to define the tool.

Parameters:
tool The tool to use (cvs, svn, diff, ...)
showDialog Show a dialog box if the tool is not defined (else throw an exception)
parentWindow The parent windows used to show the dialog.
Exceptions:
ToolsNotDefinedException
